definition.code:
schedule function verstacknazad:runparticle 1s
execute as @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{id:"minecraft:anvil",Count:1b}}] run execute at @s run execute if entity @e[type=item,distance=..0.702,nbt={Item:{id:"minecraft:diamond",Count:1b}}] run execute if block ~ ~-0.25 ~ crafting_table run function verstacknazad:particle
definition.name: runparticle
